cab.content: Military Secret.1000151\ From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, VV/ f \u. j lltli July 1919.' 0/7 (Received 18th.)9683. 17th July, No. 67. Parti:-1. Shahgasi Khwaja Muhammad is reported to have gone back to Kaki, whence he is expected to return to Bazar with ammunition and supplies. Contingents of Malikdin Kambar and Britki Khel reported to have arrived Bazar 15th July, where the)7 have been stopped by Zakka Khel, who resent this excursion into their limits.2. No change elsewhere.Part 2 :-3. Force, from Thai is undertaking punitive operations against Biland Khelvillages. No opposition met. Communicated to Press.
